properties.name: Georgetown
properties.why_notable: Capital, wooden colonial architecture, St. George's Cathedral, Stabroek Market

properties.name: Kaieteur Falls
properties.why_notable: World's largest single-drop waterfall (226m), 5x height of Niagara, remote jungle

properties.name: Rupununi Savanna
properties.why_notable: Vast grasslands, indigenous villages, giant anteaters, jaguars, cowboy culture

properties.name: Iwokrama Rainforest
properties.why_notable: 371,000 hectares pristine rainforest, canopy walkway, jaguar tracking

properties.name: Orinduik Falls
properties.why_notable: Cascading terraced falls on Brazil border, jasper rock, natural jacuzzi
